<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_ohs_im_injury_illness</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_ohs_im_injury_illness">employee_start_timeVALCHANGES^ORdate_time_of_injuryVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Set i/i date time fields</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
// Set the same date/time that users set in the UI form (display value) and not the GMT value
current.setValue('employee_start_time', current.employee_start_time.getDisplayValue()); current.setValue('date_time_of_injury', current.date_time_of_injury.getDisplayValue());
if (current.time_of_death) { current.setValue('time_of_death', current.time_of_death.getDisplayValue()); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-04-12 11:08:02</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2571da97778225107c7c8bfa7a5a99d7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set i/i date time fields</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">f27b42a72f373010f2bf532a2799b693</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">f27b42a72f373010f2bf532a2799b693</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2571da97778225107c7c8bfa7a5a99d7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-31 20:40:42</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2571da97778225107c7c8bfa7a5a99d7"/> </record_update>
